thread.title: Stocks That Were In News On July 17
thread.title_full: Stocks That Were In News On July 17

title: Stocks That Were In News On July 17
text:
The Sensex ended the day marginally higher by 17 points, while the Nifty gained 1.80 points in trade. 
Check top gainers and losers in BSE & NSE stock market today . 
Mind Tree 
Shares in MindTree rallied a huge 4 per cent after the company reported a good set of numbers for the quarter ending June 30, 2015. 
The company also said that the Board of Directors of the Company have approved the acquisition of 100% of the equity interest in Relational Solutions, Inc a US based IT solutions. 
The stock ended the day at Rs 1268, higher by 3.26 per cent on BSE. It touched an intraday high Rs 1286 during the trade. 
Sun Pharmaceutical 
Shares of the Sun Pharmaceutical rose even on Friday after the brokerage CLSA raised target price on the stock to Rs 1,160 
The stock ended the day at Rs 946, higher by 0.76 per cent on BSE. It touched an intraday high Rs 957 during the trade. 
Crompton Greaves 
Shares of the company rose after its signed a contract to provide ZIV protections for Saudi Electricity Company (SEC), the largest power utility company in the Middle East serving approximately five million customers in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA)," said the Avantha Group Company. 
The stock ended the day at Rs 197, higher by 2.59 per cent on BSE. It touched an intraday high Rs 199 during the trade. 
Lupin 
Lupin rose on Friday after the company got approval from the US Food and Drug Administration .The stock ended the day at Rs 1974, higher by 1.02 per cent on BSE. It touched an intraday high Rs 1984 during the trade. 
NIIT 
NIIT has reported a goos set of numbers in first quarter profit at Rs 15 crore compared to Rs 0.6 crore in the corresponding quarter of last fiscal. 
The stock ended the day at Rs 57.95, higher by 11.23 per cent on BSE. It touched an intraday high Rs 60.90 during the trade. 
GoodReturns.in
